txt.en: 'I'm not staying here long. I'm just waiting for the roads to get a little safer.'
'After the last caravan was attacked, I don't think travelling alone is a wise idea.'
'I'm from out of Bree. It's a long way from home, but it pays well!'
'Don't tell anyone, but instead of paying me in coin, Hannar's letting me in on a share of the mine.'
